metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30524 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: There is an invalid memory access in the TextLine class in TextOutputDev.ccin Xpdf 4.0.4 because the text extractor mishandles characters at large ycoordinates. It can be triggered by (for example) sending a crafted pdffile to the pdftotext binary, which allows a remote attacker to cause aDenial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: ipe package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
